description:
As a merchant
  I want to select all customer after using advaned filter
name: Can use customer select all if has advanced filter

elements.name: Test with multiple filter conditions applied(Gender + Created_Time+ Registered_Time)

steps.name: I am on Admin Login Page
I fill correct account email to email field
I fill correct account password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I check intercom message notification frame and click clear intercom message button
I check intercom message notification frame and click intercom message close button
I check new feature alert notification frame and click new feature alert close button
I check and click exclude products panel close button
I check and click no thanks button
I am on Customer List Page
I select language dropdown option included 'English' of language dropdown
I should see search field
I click on all row of select checkbox
I check and click select all button
I select delete selected of bulk action dropdown
I should see popover
I click on ok button
I wait for 15 seconds for deleting
I am on Customer List Page
I should not see row of select checkbox list
I select import report dropdown option included 'Import Report' of import report dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["Import Report","Import History","Bulk Update Customer Tags"],"text":"Import Report"}

steps.name: I should be redirected to Customer Bulk Import Update Page
I pick customer select all bulk upload file to file upload selector
I click on import customer button
I should see popover
I click on ok button
I wait for 15 seconds for update
I should be redirected to Bulk Import Export Progress Page
I Refresh
I should see report list
report list should contain 'Bulk Import Customer'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Bulk Import Customer Customer Done 2021-09-22 4:01AM 2021-09-22 4:01AM 2021-09-22 4:01AMTotal : 76Successful / Failed : 76 / 0","expectText":"Bulk Import Customer"}

steps.name: report list should contain 'Customer'
report list should contain Export date
report list should contain 'Total : 76'
report list should contain 'Successful / Failed : 76 / 0'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Bulk Import Customer Customer Done 2021-09-22 4:01AM 2021-09-22 4:01AM 2021-09-22 4:01AMTotal : 76Successful / Failed : 76 / 0","expectText":"Successful / Failed : 76 / 0"}

steps.name: 1st row of Status list should equal to 'Done'
I am on Customer List Page
I click on filter dropdown
I select filter type dropdown option included 'Gender' of filter type dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["Birthday","Created Time","Added From","Registered Time","Is a Member","Is Blacklisted","Gender","Accepts Marketing","User Credit Balance","Membership tier","Tag","Membership Expiry Date","Email verification Status"],"text":"Gender"}

steps.name: I select filter condition dropdown option included 'Male' of filter condition dropdown
I click on add filter button
I should see apply filter label
apply filter label should contain 'Gender: Male'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Showing users where: users.query.locale.is: Gender: Male","expectText":"Gender: Male"}

steps.name: I click on filter dropdown
I select filter type dropdown option included 'Created Time' of filter type dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["Birthday","Created Time","Is a Member","Is Blacklisted","Registered Time","Added From","Gender","User Credit Balance","Accepts Marketing","Membership Expiry Date","Membership tier","Tag","Email verification Status"],"text":"Created Time"}

steps.name: I select filter condition dropdown option included 'in the last week' of filter condition dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["in the last week","in the last month","in the last year","on or after","on or before"],"text":"in the last week"}

steps.name: I click on add filter button
I should see apply filter label
apply filter label should contain 'Created Time:'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Showing users where: users.query.locale.is: Gender: Male Created Time: 2021-09-15 on or after","expectText":"Created Time:"}

steps.name: I click on filter dropdown
I select filter type dropdown option included 'Registered Time' of filter type dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["Birthday","Created Time","Added From","Registered Time","Is Blacklisted","Is a Member","User Credit Balance","Gender","Membership tier","Membership Expiry Date","Tag","Email verification Status","Accepts Marketing"],"text":"Registered Time"}

steps.name: I select filter condition dropdown option included 'in the last week' of filter condition dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["in the last week","in the last month","in the last year","on or after","on or before"],"text":"in the last week"}

steps.name: I click on add filter button
I should see apply filter label
apply filter label should contain 'Registered Time:'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Showing users where: users.query.locale.is: Gender: Male Created Time: 2021-09-15 on or after Registered Time: 2021-09-15 on or after","expectText":"Registered Time:"}

steps.name: I click on all row of select checkbox
I should see select all button
select all button should contain 'Select all 25 items'
I click on select all button
clear all button should contain 'Clear selection'
I select delete selected of bulk action dropdown
I should see popover
I click on ok button
I should see back to customer list button
I click on back to customer list button
I should be redirected to Customer List Page
I wait for 10 seconds for deleting
I am on Customer List Page
I click on all row of select checkbox
I should see select all button
select all button should contain 'Select all 51 items'
---ROLL BACK---
I am on Customer List Page
I click on all row of select checkbox
I check and click select all button
I select delete selected of bulk action dropdown
I should see popover
I click on ok button
I wait for 15 seconds for deleting
I am on Customer List Page
I should not see row of select checkbox list
I am on Shop Home Page
I click on sign in button
I should be redirected to Shop Login Page
I click on switch to signup tab button
I should be redirected to Shop Sign Up Page
I fill line email to email field
I fill '1234567890' to password field
I fill 'test' to name field
I click on send via mail and sms checkbox
I click on agree terms checkbox
I click on submit button
I should be redirected to Shop Home Page
I wait for 10 seconds for mail sent
I am on Customer List Page
I input email to search field
customer row should contain 'testuser@shoplineapp.com'
